title: On different Wifi, Stuck on authentication stage(can't log in)
body:
^

I am staying in another home for mulltiple reasons aside, and I wanted to play some league, however when I try to log onto my account, it gets stuck authenticating!

Help!

replies.body:
It sounds like that connection you're on isn't allowing your client to contact our servers. I recommend checking out our  [**CONNECTION GUIDE**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) to better optimize it during your stay there! 

If the issues persist, hit me up in a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and I'll get right into investigating it!
It's been temporarily resolved, thank you for helping out!

I am pretty darn sure its port forwarding thats beating me up(I tried everything else, except Wired and firewalls.), however I can't address the issue as I don't have the providers username and password at the current moment. Thank you so much, I will ask tomorrow! I'll keep you updated... Level 7 Tristana awaits me.
